description: Numbers n such that 5*10^n + 7*R_n is prime, where R_n = 11...1 is the repunit (A002275) of length n.
comments: Also numbers n such that (52*10^n-7)/9 is prime.a(20) > 10^5. - _Robert Price_, Dec 30 2014
links: Makoto Kamada, Prime numbers of the form 577...77.
